# AORO (Autonomous Outcome-Based Revenue Orchestrator)

This repo contains a stateful multi-agent system for compliance-driven industrial services (Commercial Fire Safety), built to discover trigger events, generate technical outreach, gate approvals (HITL), and integrate with ServiceTitan via MCP.

## Start here (high signal)

- Master plan: `docs/plan/aoro_mvp_master_plan.md`
- AI documentation hub: `docs/ai/README.md`
- Changelog: `docs/ai/CHANGELOG.md`
- Worklog: `docs/ai/WORKLOG.md`
- ADRs: `docs/ai/adr/README.md`
- MVP architecture ADR: `docs/ai/adr/0001-mvp-scope-and-architecture.md`

## Core code entrypoints

- FastAPI app: `src/api/main.py`
- LangGraph workflow: `src/agents/orchestrator.py`
- Agents:
  - Research: `src/agents/nodes/researcher.py`
  - Outreach: `src/agents/nodes/communicator.py`
  - Objections: `src/agents/nodes/closer.py`
  - HITL gate: `src/agents/nodes/human_review.py`
- MCP server: `src/integrations/mcp/server.py`
- ServiceTitan client: `src/integrations/servicetitan/client.py`

## Knowledge layer

- Neo4j graph: `src/knowledge/graph/fire_code_graph.py`
- Pinecone vectors: `src/knowledge/vectors/pinecone_client.py`
- Embeddings: `src/knowledge/vectors/embeddings.py`

## Signal engine

- Scraper framework: `src/signal_engine/scrapers/base_scraper.py`
- Playwright permit scraper: `src/signal_engine/scrapers/permit_scraper.py`
- Enrichment: `src/signal_engine/enrichment/company_enricher.py`
